body.p: The Wine development release 1.5.26 is now available.

What's new in this release:
OpenGL support in the Mac driver.
Clipboard and drag&drop support in the Mac driver.
Improvements to the URL cache.
Some fixes for ARM binaries.
SPARC platform no longer supported.
Various bug fixes.

p.p: The source is available now. Binary packages are in the process of being built, and will appear soon at their respective download locations.
